title: Rebounding ability
body:
Quick idea for an ability

The ability rebounds an enemy projectile. Imagine 'batting' it away. The projectile then becomes either neutral or friendly. 50% reduction in damage when colliding with allies and/or enemies. Possibly able to chose direction it gets 'batted' away.

I understand something like this will be nigh impossible to code but imagine how awesome it would be to 'bat' away a Jinx ulti that would otherwise kill you and kill her instead.

Would like to know what people think of an ability like this

replies.body: In appreciation of the pun I made{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

I personally love this idea.

The love for it stems from my love of playing a Warrior in WoW. Regardless of what was 'Best' in PvP for Warriors, I have always loved the spell reflect option they have, and I would ALWAYS take that option.

There is just some sort of true satisfaction of saying 'Nope' and reflecting a spell back in their face.

If this came about in League - I would main the hell out of the champ it was attached to.
Maybe the champ could have a mace-on-a-chain like weapon? Similar to Sejuani's but maybe smaller
So similar to Fiora? :p but more intense? haha
Similar yes, but it is only is able to rebound 1 ability at a time. Fiora can block multiple abilities at a time
